name: Operands
description:
OPERANDS is a simple, turn-based puzzle game based around arithmetic.

Move around the hex board, using arithmetic symbols to add to, deduct from, multiply by or divide the 'power' shown on the player.

Use this power to defeat the enemies that come for you in WAVES of ever increasing difficulty! How many waves can you survive? And what's the highest score you can achieve?

An endless, addictive little game that encourages you to try again and again to improve your strategy!
